query:
ALTER TABLE `email_templates` 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `template_type` enum('application_received','status_update','interview_scheduled','interview_reminder','offer_extended','rejection','custom') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'custom',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `html_content` text,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `text_content` text,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `branding_config` text,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `dynamic_fields` text,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `is_variant` boolean DEFAULT false NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `parent_template_id` int,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `variant_name` varchar(100),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `sent_count` int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `open_count` int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `click_count` int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `response_count` int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `is_default` boolean DEFAULT false NOT NULL;
command:

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `template_type` enum('application_received','status_update','interview_scheduled','interview_reminder','offer_extended','rejection','custom') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'custom',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `html_content` text,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `text_content` text,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `branding_config` text,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `dynamic_fields` text,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `is_variant` boolean DEFAULT false NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `parent_template_id` int,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `variant_name` varchar(100),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `sent_count` int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `open_count` int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `click_count` int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `response_count` int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `is_default` boolean DEFAULT false NOT NULL;
